Hello World!

13 Feb 2014

Want to create blog posts? Simple!

  1. Copy this file (into _posts)
  2. Re-name the new file so that it has the current date at the start of its file name (in yyy-mm-dd format)
  3. Open the new file up and change the heading -- change title, date, and categories to match your post (DON'T change the layout)
  4. Rebuild Jekyll and publish to your site

Wherever you'd like a link to your blog, you can now use /advice/news/2014/02/13/hello-world.html

Happy blogging!
